desc: We are looking for developers who are proficient in Android Studio, who are able to create games (such as puzzles and code cracking games) but can also have various screens triggered via serial interface.Our android touch screen is attached by a serial device (similar to an arduino) and is sent various command strings.   The commands will trigger the games that you design, play videos, display images etc.We need a quick turnaround time, so a good understanding of serial communication and game mechanics is a must.We are also looking for developers who speak good english.   A communication barrier will hamper our progress.This is a test project to see if work is acceptable.   Development begins immediately, with completion required within 2 days.   Further work is available if the work provided in this project is up to an acceptable standard.For this game, we are looking for a simple 'Find the Odd One Out' game.   The user is presented with multiple images, which all look very similar.   Only one of the images is unique.If the user sees an image which is duplicated elsewhere, they must discard it by dragging it off the screen.They continue doing this until only one image remains.   If the image which remains is correct, then the user has successfully completed the game and they get a screen saying so.   If they have not identified the correct image, all the original objects which they discarded are returned back to their original place, and they musty start again.Multi-touch is required in this game as more than one user may play at once.The attached zip file contains the images along with examples of how the game should look.   One of these files is a .psd.  A good grasp of photoshop will be extremely beneficial here.
title: Android Games with serial command integration - test

desc: Summary:The goal is to implement an App for iOS and Android for a boat company, based on the existing app of the customer. The purpose of the app is to use Georeferencing to filter the available information according to the user's location.The app works through direct links to the customer’s website with the exception of the functionality of marking the areas using Google maps.All the configuration of other areas should be done in the backoffice of the website and the data will be absorbed by the webservices of the app.The design of the app, backoffice and necessary webservices will be developed by us.Features:1. Locations and Routes:1.1. Allow setting of zones defined by links to Google Maps. There may exist several zones defined in the backoffice of the website and consumed by webservices.2. Rent a boat:2.1. Link to page already existing in the website.3. Events:3.1. Link to page already existing in the website.4. Contacts:4.1. Link to page already existing in the website.5. SOS:5.1. Link to page already existing in the website.6. Entities:6.1. Link to page already existing in the website.7. News feed:7.1. It gets the info by a webservice coming from the customer’s website8. Legislation:8.1. Link to page already existing in the website.
title: Development of an App - Boat company

desc: I have an already developed MobileApp, for managing livestock animals; its an offline android App, developed using Android Studio. I want an expert, who can study the source code, understand it well, and add the following features; only serious, experienced, and fast developers should bid; to show your seriousness and to know that you have read my requirements well, include the word, Livestock App in your bid description.The features are;1. Database and Dashboard for Admin Panel (to make it an online app)2. Edit Option (to be able to edit the information entered)3. Ability to add photos (to be able to upload photos of the animals)4. Multiple addition of Breeders, Matings & Litters (to be able to add information of more than one animal at once)5. Cage Card (for both Breeder Information and Litter Information; to be able to extract the entered information into a card, that can be printed out)6. Pdf Print out for Breeder, Litter & Mating Lists (to be able to print out a sheet containing all breeders and litters)7. Live Chat (we can intergrate it in the App, using API from service providers, who provide that live chat services)8. Notifications (Intergrating the App with google calender, such that the events entered into the App are shown in google calender, and the user gets notifications for the events)9. Intergration of Payment System for Subscriptions (Mobile Money, Paypal, MasterCard, Visa Cards)My budget is $300, and the App is needed in strictly 10 days.
title: Android App New Features

desc: Hi, I operate a building and construction business and am looking for expertise and experience with developing an invoicing app similar to [url removed, login to view] (I am currently using this app but it has limitations for my business).The mobile app needs to be able to have the similar features as the invoice2go app, including:1. Create quotes with the ability to add pictures and descriptions2. Capable of emailing and tracking quotes3. Action quotes as approved or lost4. Create invoices based on quotes generated in (1) above5. Track Payments against an invoice6. Accept payments from credit and debit cards7. Generate invoice remindersIn addition to the above standard features, the app needs to be able to track invoices issued to an approved quote. For example, if an approved quote for $20,000 allows for 4 progress invoices to be issued of $5,000 each, the app needs to generate 4 invoices which show both the $5,000 invoice amount and the amount outstanding against the approved quote amount after all invoices issued to date. That is, the 1st invoice should show $5,000 payable with $15,000 outstanding on the approved quote. The 2nd invoice should show $5,000 payable with $10,000 outstanding on the approved quote etc.The app needs to work on smartphones as well as Mac and PC platforms.Thank you for your consideration and interest. Looking forward to hearing from you.
title: Develop a Cloud Based Invoicing App

desc: Project Description:Mobile App integration or API for our project (simple test-app GUI is appreciated for testing), in order to work with qualcomm chipsets on the android phones.API  must intercept and write Layer 3 data to log files as well as extract particular parameters of signalization in real time, decode them and send them to our application. Following particular parameters have to be delivered:- 3G/WCDMA: Band, Ec/Io, RSCP, RSSI, PSC, RRC State,TX Level, Neighbor Cell Measurements, HSPA+ DC in use, Audio Codec Type, AMR Bitrate- 2G/GSM: Band, RxLev, RxQual, C/I, TxPower, ARFCN, RRC State,Serving Cell measurements, Neighbor Cell Measurements, Audio Codec Type, AMR Bitrate- 4G/LTE: Band, RSRP, SINR, RSRQ, RSSI, EARFCN, RRC State,- Layer-3 Messages - GSM RR, WCDMA RRC, CC, MM must be captured and written to a plain text file.The programm must run on Qualcomm based phones.Requirements :- Understanding of GSM, UMTS, LTE technologies- Understanding and experience of Layer 3 tracing and decoding- Experience with Qualcomm chipsets- support our development team for integration.
title: Android API for Layer 3 messages
